name: Woo Your Man Steak
ingredients: 3 Tbsp. lemon juice (or juice from one lemon)
instructions: Mix all ingredients except steak and pour into Ziplock bag. Add steak and marinate 4-12 hours in fridge, turning occasionally.
To cook, place heatproof cooling rack on a cookie sheet and place steaks on top. Broil on High for 35-45 minutes, turning every 10 minutes. Steaks should be medium-rare when done this way.
